articles.author: Colin Demarest
articles.title: Messy messaging on Ukraine underscores D.C. dysfunction - Axios
articles.description: Jumbled narratives and dismissive answers raise questions about what an "America First" foreign policy looks like.
articles.content: Driving the news: President Trump on Monday reversed a hold on weapons shipments to Ukraine. He told his counterpart, President Volodymyr Zelensky, in the intervening days he hadn't actually ordered … [+2709 chars]
